title: Augmented Reality-Based Elementary Social and Cultural Learning Media Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Digital Device Usage Skills and Basic Elementary Social Studies Concepts
context.additional_context: Step-by-step guidance is necessary as learners may be unfamiliar with augmented reality experiences via smartphones. Strengthening collaborative learning through offline group activities

learning_goals: Learners can use augmented reality technology to explore prehistoric cultural heritage in 3D and explain key features
Learners can analyze the historical significance of cultural products through AR-based media and connect them to modern life contexts
Learners can create simple cultural heritage explanatory materials using digital content production tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
